column3: Process of shifty-making is of big help-use. First, be taking five need-not materia, yes? Melty-mix this one, mixy-melt that one, squeeze and squash, then bigeyes! Five need-not are reborn as one shiny-new!

What kind of materia is reborn? Such knowings do not rattle Mutamix's braincase. Maybe new materia is worth much jinglyshine; maybe it is even more scrappyjunk than five before. Shifty-making is exciting chance-game, yes?

Mutamix will perform materia transmutation for you at any time, free of charge. Bring the goblin five pieces of unwanted materia, and he will transform them into a single new piece to use as you see fit.
That said, materia transmutation remains an inexact science. As for what manner of materia will emerge each time Mutamix works his wonders, not even the goblin genius himself can say.
